children.text: I hereby confirm that I have read the information.

Please test the baby monitor thoroughly each time you use it! 

1: Do not leave your baby without regular supervision. Technical problems, positioning, network errors or wrong settings might cause the baby monitor to malfunction or not to detect when the baby is crying. 

2: Some dialer programs will not allow the alarm to resume to operation - please disable these programs if this is the case. 

3: Make sure that your phone has sufficient power - plug it into the charger to be safe. 

Remember that no baby monitor can replace attentive parents. 

How to use it: 

1: Enter the number to dial or to text when the baby monitor is triggered. 

2: Set the contact method - the baby monitor can either call another phone or text another phone. 

3: Set whether the alarm should take a picture or not when it has been triggered. 

4: Set the sensitivity level (how sensitive the baby monitor is). 80 is the default value. 

6: Optional: Press the test button to test your settings. When the baby monitor is in test mode it wont call or text you. 

7: Press Start the baby monitor button to start the baby monitor. 

Sleep log: 

The sleep log allows you to follow your babies sleep pattern. You can either add an entry manually by pressing the button "Add entry" or you can add an entry by pressing "yes" after you have used the baby monitor. 



The developer of this program do not take ANY responsibility of how this program is used or any malfunctions. Test it thoroughly before use.
